addAlso(PlotElement, PlotElement) - Method in class natlang.rdg.discourse.DiscourseHistory
Compares two plot elements and checks if they satisfy the requirements for adding 'also': - the plot elements differ in only one argument - the plot elements differ in two arguments and these arguments have been swapped Additional requirement: - if the plot elements differ in only one argument AND this argument is the name of the action: only add the cue word if the plot elements happen at the same time!

Entity - class natlang.rdg.discourse.Entity.
An entity object contains all information necessary for the Referring Expression Generator: the unique name, concept, gender, which nouns have been used to lexicalize the entity, whether it is the first reference to the entity in the current paragraph, its salience value, the number of pronouns used in a row, the number of sentences ago that the entity was mentioned, the part of speech, and whether it has already been the head of a phrase in the current sentence
